QuestData.Title: Crystals of Unusual Power
QuestData.Description: Arcane crystals of this size and power are quite rare even on Draenor. It is no coincidence that the Draenei built Shattrath and Auchindoun so close to this mine.$b$bI am interested in learning more about these particular crystals and their arcane nature.$b$bReturn to me with any unrefined power crystals that you may find and I will make sure that you are adequately compensated for your effort.
QuestData.RewardText: The crystals in this mine are most certainly unique. Thorough study of the samples you have provided should reveal why this is the case.
